long_description: The Saris Bones 2-Bike Trunk rack has an innovative arc-based design that separates bikes to different levels and fits over the spoilers of many cars. Heavy-duty recyclable plastic construction stands up to wear and tear; injection-molded arms and legs will never rust, and can support 2 bikes with ease. Ratchet straps securely hold bikes in place; anti-sway, articulated feet protect the paint on your car, ensuring bikes and vehicle aren't damaged. Cradle design accommodates most bicycle frame designs. Easily fits a wide range of vehicles including sedans, hatchbacks and minivans. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The Saris Bones 2-Bike Trunk rack has an innovative arc-based design that separates bikes to different levels and fits over the spoilers of many cars.
